answerText: Thor [or Thunar; or Donar][10] Zeus's thunderbolts were made by a trio of Cyclopes, who as their names suggest each provided the bolts with one of the three aspects of thunder, lightning, and brightness. Name any two of them.
heading: DEES |2014 | WUSTL  | 14 | Mythology | None | College
subject: Mythology
question: Question: Answer the following about mythological thunder,  [10] This Norse god's name is etymologically related to older terms for thunder. More excitingly, he wields the hammer Mjollnir and will kill the Midgard Serpent at Ragnar√∂k but die after taking nine steps.
